text: [Music]
tell us a little bit about what your
journey has looked like it's been a it's
been an interesting one so when when we
started on this it's coming up on two
years ago now that we sort of started
down this road of of saying how can we

started out of necessity we we had some
particular project that was very far
behind and we were really struggling to

with the technologies that have been
chosen and we just were very hamstrung
with having to constantly battle with
the technologies that we were trying to

different way to do this and so we
actually started out and said okay let's
write some let's write some Python and
Django applications and use Apple and
we'll just bundle that all up and we'll
push it into lambda and in that way is
where we started with the with the you
know the serverless journey that we're
on it was just a matter of expediency
and and how can we eliminate the need to
deal with anything other than the code

were trying to get up
